column4: is there anyway to make vino-server start on startup. i understand it is started when a user logs into gnome... but how can i start it up automatically?
you could install vnc4server and make that start at boot as a specific user... or spawn as needed.. that wont share the current 'visible' desktop.
or set up a auto-login user that auto logs in :)
I think I'll setup an autologin... thanks for the suggestion
